page.title: 13FASHION IN THE VILLAGE
page.content:
MAY 1985- MOST TEENAGE GIRLS IN DURRINGTON WEAR JEANS WHICH ARE SKIN TIGHT. SOME PEOPLE WEAR THREE-QUARTER LENGTH OR FADED JEANS. BOYS USUALLY WEAR COMBAT JACKETS OR DONKEY JACKETS. THEY ALSO WEAR JEANS AND DOC MARTIN BOOTS. WHITE JACKETS ARE IN THE FASHION FOR BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS, PALE COLOURS LIKE LIGHT BLUE,PINK OR YELLOW. BAGGY CLOTHES, CLOTHES THAT ARE TOO BIG ARE ALSO AROUND.
TEENAGERS BUY THEIR CLOTHS FROM 'TOP-SHOP' 'TOP-MAN' 'TOP=GIRL' OR 'CHELSEA GIRL' 'FOSTERS' OR AT THE MARKET. MOST GIRLS BUY SHOES FROM ' FREEMAN,HARDY AND WILLIS' OR 'DOLCIS'.
